name: Conformance Criteria (Whats Required): Inspection of concrete product upon delivery to site. Ensure there is no damage or cracking to the precast unit.
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required): Class 2 RCRRJ pipe, pipe to be inspected upon delivery and have no damage or deformities
BENCHING AND OTHER MASS POURS FOR MANHOLE
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required): Minimum 1:4 crossfall grade towards formed channel, all surfaces finished smooth, no benching shall hold water
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required): A level 150mm AP65 compacted base.
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required): All backfilled material shall be compaction tested at a maximum of 20m intervals longitudinally with an NDM.
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required): Class 2 RCRRJ pipe, pipe to be inspected upon delivery and have no damage or deformities
Frequency: Prior to commencement/upon delivery of materials
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required): Clean granular non-cohesive material with a maximum particle size of 20mm
3 - OPEN TRENCHING ALIGNMENT, DEPTH AND ACCURACY

Conformance Criteria (Whats Required): Installed within +/- 10mm accuracy from design datum. Installed as per design grade and recorded on pipe laying form. Daily checks to make sure pipe is laid to design.
Frequency: Prior to commencement and every two lengths

Conformance Criteria (Whats Required): Trench backfill to be carried out with imported AP65 gravel in 250mm lifts. The subbase material shall achieve an average of 95% of the MDD. All backfilled material shall be compaction tested at a maximum of 20m intervals longitudinally and 1m vertically with an NDM. All basecourse material shall be M4AP40.
Conformance Criteria (Whats Required): Clear new pipeline of any debris prior to CCTV. CCTV inspection of gravity to be as per the New Zealand Pipe Inspection manual.
